about_the_game:
Disguised Blessing Demo is a fast-paced, first-person hack-and-slash game where you explore ancient ruins, battle mysterious creatures, and collect powerful blessings to survive. Slide, maneuver, and conquer your enemies!

Ultimate and special abilities

Disguised Blessing offers an ability-based combat experience. Find Ability Scrolls to unlock abilities like Bleed, Haste, or Health steal, enhancing your powers!

Wall running, sliding, dashing, climbing

Power-Ups

Ranging from common to heroic, enhance your strengths and weaknesses. You can create unique runs and builds with custom-made power-ups or by using fully randomized options.

Weapon skins

Do you enjoy showcasing your collection of weapon skins? By defeating enemies, you earn coins to buy your favorite skins. Customize your Katana, Kunai, short sword, or sheath.

Disguised Blessing Demo is a fast-paced, first-person hack-and-slash game where you explore ancient ruins, battle mysterious creatures, and collect powerful blessings to survive. Slide, maneuver, and conquer your enemies!

Ultimate and special abilities

Disguised Blessing offers an ability-based combat experience. Find Ability Scrolls to unlock abilities like Bleed, Haste, or Health steal, enhancing your powers!

Wall running, sliding, dashing, climbing

Power-Ups

Ranging from common to heroic, enhance your strengths and weaknesses. You can create unique runs and builds with custom-made power-ups or by using fully randomized options.

Weapon skins

Do you enjoy showcasing your collection of weapon skins? By defeating enemies, you earn coins to buy your favorite skins. Customize your Katana, Kunai, short sword, or sheath.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Disguised Blessing Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

short_description: Disguised Blessing is a dynamic first-person combat game focused on fluid movement and ability-centered combat. Use power-ups and special abilities as you slice through enemies, unlock weapon skins and progress through endless combinations of attributes.
